data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Colima to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Colima, Mexico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Colima, Mexico with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Colima.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Colima, Mexico. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Huichol people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Colima, Mexico.
Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Colima, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Colima, Mexico to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
